robot

Class Var

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Var

  • public final class Var
extends java.lang.Object
    Assembly functions - class Var
    Provides the funcions for allocating, freeing, setting and getting local variables.
    Author:
    Renato Cordeiro Ferreira
    See Also:
    Ctrl

    • Method Detail

      • ALOC

        static void ALOC(RVM rvm,
        Stackable name)
          throws SegmentationFaultException,
                 WrongTypeException
        Assembly funcion ALOC.
        Allocates a variable in the local stack. If it is already defined, throws an exception to warn about the wrong memory usage.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        name - Variable name (to be defined)
        Throws:
        SegmentationFaultException
        WrongTypeException

      • FREE

        static void FREE(RVM rvm,
        Stackable name)
          throws SegmentationFaultException,
                 WrongTypeException
        Assembly funcion FREE.
        Frees a variable, returning its memory to the virtual machine. If the name is not defined in the stack, throws an exception to warn about the wrong memory usage.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        name - Variable name (to be freed)
        Throws:
        SegmentationFaultException
        WrongTypeException

      • SET

        static void SET(RVM rvm,
       Stackable name)
         throws SegmentationFaultException,
                WrongTypeException
        Assembly funcion SET.
        Sets a local variable with the value in the top of the main stack. If the variable was not allocated, throws an exception to warn about the wrong memory usage.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        name - Variable name (to be setted)
        Throws:
        SegmentationFaultException
        WrongTypeException

      • GET

        static void GET(RVM rvm,
       Stackable name)
         throws NotInitializedException,
                SegmentationFaultException,
                WrongTypeException
        Assembly funcion GET.
        Gets the value stored in the memory (if avaiable) and puts it in the top of the main stack.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        name - Variable name (to have its value returned)
        Throws:
        NotInitializedException
        SegmentationFaultException
        WrongTypeException
